samples.question: Why do you think it is important to learn a foreign language?
samples.transcript: I think learning a foreign language is very important because language is not just a language. Language is a gateway to a culture. >> If we learn a new language, we gain access to different cultures, pers perspective and culture, art and music. >> Okay.
samples.transcript_original: I think um uh learning a foreign language is very important because language is not just a language. Language is a gateway to a culture. >> If we learn a new language, we gain access to different cultures, pers perspective and culture, art and music. >> Okay.
samples.transcript_cleaned: I think learning a foreign language is very important because language is not just a language. Language is a gateway to a culture. >> If we learn a new language, we gain access to different cultures, pers perspective and culture, art and music. >>
